title: Biden's lead over Warren narrows in new Democratic presidential poll
text: Former Vice President Joe Biden continues to lead Sen. Elizabeth Warren and other contenders in a new poll of Democratic hopefuls, but his lead has narrowed. In a new USA Today/Suffolk University survey, Biden was backed by 26% of likely Democratic primary and caucus voters. Warren was second at 17%, followed by Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders at 13% and South Bend, Ind., Mayor Pete Buttigieg at 10%. Biden's lead over Warren, now nine percentage points, was 18 points in the same survey in late August.
description: Former Vice President Joe Biden continues to lead Sen. Elizabeth Warren and other contenders in a new poll of Democratic hopefuls, but his lead has narrowed....
